skill.name: explorer
skill.description: Quickly search and navigate the codebase - Use when you need to quickly find files, search for patterns, or locate specific code without deep analysis.
skill.summary: Quickly search and navigate the codebase - Use when you need to quickly find files, search for patte...
skill.author: 0xSero

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no executable code. Only contains a SKILL.md configuration file that defines AI behavior for code exploration tasks. No file access, network calls, command execution, or environment variable access capabilities.

content.value_statement: Finding specific files and code patterns in large projects takes too much time. This skill provides fast, focused search and navigation capabilities to locate files, symbols, and definitions without deep analysis.
actual_capabilities: Search for files by name patterns across the codebase
Surface concise summaries with file references
Suggest next files to inspect based on context
limitations: Does not modify or write any code
Does not perform deep code analysis or refactoring
Focused on navigation, not design changes
Output is limited to file locations and summaries

use_cases.title: Find files fast
use_cases.description: Quickly locate configuration files, components, or utility functions without manual searching through directories.

use_cases.title: Understand code structure
use_cases.description: Rapidly map out where specific functions are defined and trace dependencies across the codebase.

use_cases.title: Onboard quickly
use_cases.description: Learn project structure by finding relevant files and understanding code organization patterns.

prompt_templates.title: Find a file
prompt_templates.prompt: Find the file that handles user authentication in this project.

prompt_templates.title: Search patterns
prompt_templates.prompt: Search for all files that contain database connection code.

prompt_templates.title: Find definitions
prompt_templates.prompt: Find where the main function is defined and which files call it.

prompt_templates.title: Explore architecture
prompt_templates.prompt: Explore this project and show me the key directories and their purposes.

output_examples.input: Find where the API routes are defined
output: Suggested next: Check src/middleware/ for auth validation logic

best_practices: Use specific file names or patterns for faster results
Combine with other skills for complete implementation tasks
Ask for specific symbols or functions rather than broad searches
anti_patterns: Using vague search terms like "the login code"
Expecting the skill to write or modify code
Asking for deep architectural analysis in one prompt

faq.question: What AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for code exploration tasks.

faq.question: Can this skill modify my code?
faq.answer: No. The skill is read-only and only searches and navigates without making changes.

faq.question: How large can the codebase be?
faq.answer: Works with codebases of any size. Performance depends on the underlying AI model.

faq.question: Does this skill access the network?
faq.answer: No. This skill only searches locally within your project directory.

faq.question: How is this different from grep or find commands?
faq.answer: Uses AI to understand code context and provide smarter, more relevant results with explanations.

faq.question: Can I combine this with other skills?
faq.answer: Yes. Use explorer to find files, then use edit or write skills to make changes.
